snippet: Microsoft said it acquired for about $200 million Acompli, a young start-up that makes an email application for iOS and Android mobile devices.
abstract: Microsoft said it acquired for about $200 million Acompli, a young start-up that makes an email application for iOS and Android mobile devices.

headline.main: Microsoft Buys Acompli, an Email Start-Up
headline.print_headline: Microsoft Acquires Acompli, an Email Innovator
